coded_answer.p: Dear Mrs or Miss Jane X,
I am writing to thank you for the annual international arts festival which was organized on 21st-22nd November. I had spentspent at this festival for two daysspent two days at this festival.

It was a great idea to organize such a festival. I am a teacher and I love music. Most of the events which I had seensaw were good. I enjoyed the dance shows, and the jazz and rock concerts. I visited art exhibitions. There were a lot of nice pictures, sculptures and other creative works. I was impressed by them. At the festival I could talk with writers. It was an excellent idea to makehave one reasonaly-pricedreasonably-pricedreasonably priced weekend ticket for all events. A lot of people could visit as many events as the they couldwanted.

I was very surprised when I knewlearned that the stars and artists were only fromfrom only six countries. It was too littlefew for this festival. It was a pittypity that too small halls were used for the classical concertsthe halls used for the classical concerts were too small. I like going to classical concerts but at this festival the soundssound of the music werewas terrible.

I have some suggestionsuggestions for next year's festival. Firstly, it will be great if you invite more famous singers and bands. The second one is to include more musical films and plays. I would like to help you in your interesting jobwork. I look forward to your answer.
Traditional Folk Stories of the World

There are a lot of folk stories infrom around the world and there are a lot of folk stories in Estonia,. I would like to tell you one of them. This story is about a man and his three sons. This story happened a long time ago. The man was old and his sons were young.

One day the man quarreledquarrelled with his sons and they left the house tryingto try to find work. They were successful. And they had livedlived far from their father for two years. They growgrew up and became wise. They decided to return to histheir father because he was old and he needed help.
When the sons were old they began to telltalk about their life, beginning with this story, which happendhappened a long time ago.
